thread.title: A once pleasant hotel in a superb location
thread.title_full: A once pleasant hotel in a superb location - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Daunielle C
title: A once pleasant hotel in a superb location
text:
We first visited the hotel when it was freshly remodeled approximately six years ago. The location was excellent and the rooms were cramped, but clean and new, the staff was friendly, and the overall expirience was wonderful. We returned last September and found the situation much changed, The rooms and common areas had become tired and poorly maintained, the staff was grumpy, distracted, (unless discussing football) ineficient, and quite surly when there mistakes were pointed out,
Twice we ordered cabs for the morning which failed to appear because one particular night clerk could not bothered. Had the Eurostar not been delayed we would have left stranded. Do not recommend,
Room Tip: Cannot recommend any, See more room tips
